evidence.claim: Klarity utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3 storage.
Klarity's platform supports FHIR and HL7 standards for healthcare data interoperability.
The company has stated it complies with HIPAA regulations for data security and patient privacy.
Klarity implements RESTful APIs to facilitate integration with external EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of working with X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities found.
